data.text: @StJohnsTelegram It is beyond time to end all restrictions and get back to life. People can take personal precautions if they wish.

@KeithFitz81 @007butthead @StJohnsTelegram @pjackson_nl This feel like an info graphic with fine print somewhere 
Like “when within 1 metre for an hour in an enclosed room”.

where does it get the numbers?

Otherwise, a healthy unmasked person’s risk goes from 90% to 5%, when the positive person wears a mask. 

So, If +ve wear a mask
@StJohnsTelegram @pjackson_nl 'Mandate the masks' for indoors until Covid has really passed away!
